name: Police escapes

Drive your car and avoid the incoming police cars for as long as you can!

Police Escapes is a car chase, high-score hunt, and police car game. Escape the cops and avoid obstacles as long as possible in this Great car game video. Escape from Police cars, trucks, tanks, and Rocks in this police chase games high-speed chase game. Maneuver around by either using the joystick or tap controls.
